sentence.Network_en: It was freezing out there even in his buttoned-up overcoat.
sentence.Network_cn: 外面非常冷，即使穿上大衣扣上扣子也不顶事。

sentence.Network_en: The top can be worn buttoned up or open over a T-shirt.
sentence.Network_cn: 这件上衣可以系上纽扣，也可以里面套件T恤敞开穿。

sentence.Network_en: I buttoned up my coat; it was chilly.
sentence.Network_cn: 我扣上了外套的扣子；天气很冷。
